    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>14823</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Albert Einstein</string>
            <string language="en">Albert Einstein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Albert Einstein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Albert Einstein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Albert Einstein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλβέρτος Einstein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Albert Einstein</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo LO è un esempio di un esercizio interattivo per costruire una storia che fornisce una buona esercitazione di lettura dove gli allievi sviluppano una storia circa ilgrande inventore . È esercitazione trasversale utile per  differenti materie scolastiche.</string>
            <string language="en">This LO is an example of build a story interactive exercise that provides a good reading exercise where students build a story about the great inventor. It is crosscurricula exercise useful for different school subyects.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Relatività</string>
            <string language="en">Relativity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Effetto fotoelettrico</string>
            <string language="en">Photoelectric effect</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">fisica</string>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses NIEDRIGE ist ein Beispiel des Baus ein 
interaktive Übung der Geschichte, die eine gute Leseübung liefert, 
in der Kursteilnehmer eine Geschichte über den großen Erfinder 
aufbauen. Es ist die crosscurricula Übung, die für 
unterschiedliche Schule subyects nützlich ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce BAS est un exemple de la construction par 
exercice interactif d'histoire qui fournit un bon exercice de lecture 
où les étudiants établissent une histoire au sujet du grand 
inventeur. C'est exercice de crosscurricula utile pour 
différents subyects d'école.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este BAIXO é um exemplo da configuração um o 
exercício interativo da história que fornece um exercício bom da 
leitura onde os estudantes construam uma história sobre o inventor 
grande. É exercício do crosscurricula útil para subyects 
diferentes da escola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το LO είναι ένα παράδειγμα της κατασκευής μια
διαλογική άσκηση ιστορίας που παρέχει μια καλή άσκηση ανάγνωσης
όπου οι σπουδαστές χτίζουν μια ιστορία για το μεγάλο εφευρέτη. 
Είναι άσκηση crosscurricula χρήσιμη για το διαφορετικό 
σχολείο subyects.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este BAJO es un ejemplo de la estructura al 
ejercicio interactivo de la historia que proporciona a un buen 
ejercicio de la lectura donde los estudiantes construyen una historia 
sobre el gran inventor. Es ejercicio del crosscurricula útil 
para diversos subyects de la escuela.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Relativität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Photoelektrischer Effekt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Relativité</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo LO può essere usato come autoverifica e come un buon esercizio di lettura. Gli studenti possono cercare di costruire una storia su Einstein dopo aver studiato in merito all'inventore ed alle sue invenzioni. Dal momento che l'esercizio può essere ripetuto possono cercare la soluzione più volte e così apprenderanno la logica del testo e le frasi ed allo stesso tempo scopriranno la storia di un famoso inventore.</string>
            <string language="en">This LO could be used as a selassesment and a good reading exercise with a challenge. Students after learning about inventions and inventors can try to construct or bulild a story about Einstein.As the exercise can be redone they acn try their luck more times and so they learn the logics of the text and the sentences and at the same time they discover the story about a well known inventor.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
